title: گرامر پایه
desc: درس‌های ساده گرامر انگلیسی برای مبتدیان

lessons.title: درس 1: فعل To Be
lessons.content:
English Lesson: Verb 'To Be'

The verb 'be' is used to describe states. Forms: am (I), is (he/she/it), are (you/we/they).

  • I am a student.
  • She is happy.
  • We are friends.

Negative: I am not tired. Question: Are you ready?

lessons.title: درس 1: احوالپرسی
lessons.content:
Daily Vocabulary: Greetings

Hello = سلام. Goodbye = خداحافظ. How are you? = حالت چطوره؟ I'm fine, thank you = خوبم، ممنون.

  • Good morning! = صبح بخیر!
  • See you later = بعداً می‌بینمت.

lessons.title: درس 1: خرید
lessons.content:
Conversation: Shopping

Excuse me, where is the store? = ببخشید، فروشگاه کجاست؟ How much does it cost? = چقدر قیمت داره؟ It's expensive = گرونه.

  • Can I try it on? = می‌تونم امتحانش کنم؟
  • I'll take it = می‌گیرمش.
